## GeeksForGeeks Stats Card

**Dynamically generated GeeksForGeeks stats!**

[![ref-repo]](https://github.com/nikhilpal2705/GeeksforGeeks-Stats-Card)
[![ref-online-tool]](https://gfgstatscard.vercel.app/)
[![ref-official-doc]](https://github.com/nikhilpal2705/GeeksforGeeks-Stats-Card?tab=readme-ov-file#-how-to-use)

### Parameters

<details >
<summary><small>Click to show/close parameters</small></summary><p></p>

| Name | Type | Required | Default | Description | More Description |
| -------------------- | -------------------- | ------------------------ | ----------------------- | --------------------------- | ------------------------------- |
| ![ref-params] | | | | | |
| `username` | `string` | `true` |  | GeeksForGeeks username |  |
| ![ref-querys] | | | | | |
| `theme` | `string` |  | `dark` | Theme | Supported: `dark` `light`. |

</details>

```txt
https://gfgstatscard.vercel.app/{username}{?theme}
```

<p align="right"><a href="#readme-top"><img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/Back%20to%20top-555555?style=for-the-badge"></a></p>

### Examples

```markdown
<!-- nikhilpal2705 -->
![GeeksforGeeks Stats](https://gfgstatscard.vercel.app/nikhilpal2705)
```

</div>
